posts.post_content: I thought he was kinda so-so at first, but when I stopped and actually considered it more thoroughly, he really is a damn strong creature! And not only in a Vampire tribal deck. His ability to BLOCK makes him a whole lot stronger than Ashenmoor Gouger for R/B aggro decks. A solid threat for a 3 mana creature. That drawback of his won't be a huge problem. 5/5
posts.html:
